name: Track Crypto Portfolio
description:
Track and update a cryptocurrency portfolio with current prices and performance metrics.

Returns:
- Updated holdings with current prices
- Gain/loss for each holding
- Total portfolio value
- Overall portfolio performance (gain/loss percentage)
- Weighted allocation by coin

Automatically fetches latest prices for all holdings and calculates metrics.

1. Track crypto portfolio:
{
  "portfolio_id": "my-crypto-portfolio"
}

{
  "portfolio_id": "user-portfolio-2"
}
